text: Musalmaano mein se woh log jo kisi maazuri (disabling injury) ke bagair ghar baithe rehte hain aur woh jo Allah ki raah mein jaan o maal se jihad karte hain dono ki haisiyat yaksan nahin hai. Allah ne baithne walon ki ba nisbat jaan o maal se jihad karne walon ka darja bada rakkha hai, agarche har ek ke liye Allah ne bhalayi ka wada farmaya hai, magar uske haan mujaahidon ki khidmat ka muawaza baithne walon se bahut zyada hai
